text: And no one doing the first thing about it. Stung, the conductor was."what you expect me to do?" he inquired, bitter."Radio Flying Control at London Airport, is all very well, commented Mr. Hayball from the back seat.
handwritten_text: And no one doing the first thing about it. Stung, the conductor was."what you expect me to do?" he inquired, bitter."Radio Flying Control at London Airport, is all very well, commented Mr. Hayball from the back seat.
